message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $14,000, which reflects the true value of this item.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I can only afford $9,000. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my asking price reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $12,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,000. Can you consider this price?
